name: Helicopter Academy
about: Helicopter Academy, established in 1986, offers top-quality helicopter pilot training from private to professional levels. We are the only helicopter flight school guaranteeing graduates a job upon completion of our program, which includes private, commercial, and instructor pilot certificates in Robinson R22s. With nationwide locations, our training spans 0-300 hours, including valuable skills like photo flying. We ensure a smooth transition into real-world flying, with a 100% job placement guarantee for those meeting our insurance requirements. Our commitment to excellence and safety has made us a leader in helicopter pilot education, providing a comprehensive and rewarding training experience.
